com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.guava

Class OptionalCodec<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.driver.core.TypeCodec<O>
      • com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.MappingCodec<Optional<T>,T>
        • com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.guava.OptionalCodec<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The wrapped Java type

    public class OptionalCodec<T>
extends MappingCodec<Optional<T>,T>
    A codec that wraps other codecs around Guava's Optional API.
